about.summary: apispec plugin that generates OpenAPI specification (aka Swagger) for Falcon web applications

name: falcon-apispec
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "falcon-apispec" %}
{% set version = "0.3.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f69d2c4f8f4ae25fa1447aa6dea337e1c9d06cf2d4f700531b9ebac810dc907d

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3
    - apispec >=1.0
    - falcon
    - pyyaml >=3.10

test:
  imports:
    - falcon_apispec

about:
  home: https://github.com/alysivji/falcon-apispec
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  # Manually packaged license: https://github.com/alysivji/falcon-apispec/pull/15
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'apispec plugin that generates OpenAPI specification (aka Swagger) for Falcon web applications'

  dev_url: https://github.com/alysivji/falcon-apispec

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - synapticarbors
